Introduction

Sally (샐리) is a Chinese singer under Hot Idol Entertainment. She is a former member of the girl group gugudan and the Chinese project girl group Bonbon Girls 303.
Sally debuted as a member of gugudan on June 28 with their first mini album Act.1 The Little Mermaid.

On February 21, 2020, Sally released her first Chinese digital single, titled "Time to Bloom".

On April 8, 2020 it was announced Sally would participate as a contestant on the Chinese survival show Produce Camp 2020. She ranked 6th in the finale, thus becoming a member of Bon Bon Girls 303. The group officially debuted on August 11 with their first mini album The Law of Hard Candy.

On December 31 of the same year Jellyfish Entertainment announced that gugudan would disband on December 31 after four years together.
